spiritsExplanation:
The spirit of 'Outdoor & Adventure' is strongly present, as evidenced by the workout being conducted in Norway amid natural surroundings, aligning with the spirit's focus on nature-based environments. The image confirms this outdoor setting, reinforcing a score of 0.9.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is also applicable due to the workout's inclusion of continuous exercises such as squats and lunges at a quick pace, suggesting a rhythmic component. This is supported by the dance and global hits music genre, known for creating a flowing workout atmosphere, justifying a score of 0.7.

The 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit is relevant as well, indicated by the quick pace mentioned in the description along with energetic music tracks, which suggests a vigorous, fast-paced workout.
